title: Great Grand Finals
creator_credit: Seven Network Limited (Australia) and Victorian Football League
brief_description: Coverage by HSV 7 of the 1983 Grand Final between Essendon and Hawthorn. Also great moments from grand finals of the past: St Kilda’s first premiership 1966, Carlton’s amazing comeback 1970, North Melbourne & Collingwood draw 1977, Carlton & Richmond 1973, Richmond & Geelong 1967 and Nth Melbourne’s first flag in 1975.
